sectionBody.text: I'm a Front-End Developer specializing in React.js, JavaScript (ES6+), and UI/UX design, with a passion for building scalable, high-performance web applications. I’ve led front-end development efforts across multiple projects, collaborating with designers, developers, and stakeholders to create seamless digital experiences.

Based in Dallas, TX, I’m open to remote, hybrid, or relocation opportunities. I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can drive innovation, improve efficiency, and create meaningful digital experiences. I also enjoy solving complex problems, streamlining workflows, and fostering collaboration across teams. As I grow in my career, I’m focused on developing leadership skills and making a broader impact on product and team success.

Outside of work, you’ll find me at Pilates, lifting at the gym, getting lost in a good book, or crocheting something new. I also love spending time with my husband and two dogs, going to concerts, and hanging out with friends and family.

subsectionBody.text:
Front-End Development:
Experienced in building scalable and responsive web applications using React.js, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS (SCSS, LESS), and Bootstrap 5. Skilled in DOM manipulation, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance.

UI/UX Design & Prototyping:
Proficient in creating intuitive and user-centric interfaces, with experience in wireframing and prototyping using tools like Adobe XD and Balsamiq. Focused on user experience optimization, accessibility (WCAG standards), and visual design consistency.

Agile Development & Version Control:
Hands-on experience working within Agile and SAFe environments, participating in sprints, stand-ups, and cross-functional collaboration. Skilled in version control using Git, GitHub, and GitLab, with an emphasis on maintaining clean and efficient codebases.

Content Management & Email Development:
Expertise in CMS integration and customization, along with developing dynamic email templates using Adobe Campaign and Adobe Marketo. Experienced in ensuring brand consistency across both web and email platforms.

Project Leadership & Workflow Optimization:
Adept at streamlining workflows and optimizing development processes to improve efficiency and product delivery. Experienced in coordinating with stakeholders, designers, and developers to align project goals and technical execution.

Mentorship & Team Collaboration:
Passionate about mentoring junior developers and fostering team growth. Skilled in cross-functional collaboration, working closely with designers, product managers, and developers to deliver cohesive and user-friendly products.
Bachelor of Science In Computer Science
Awarded SMU Memorial Scholarship, Multicultural Academic Achievement

subsectionData.subsectionSubheading: SMU Office of Multicultural Student Affairs (OMSA) | September 2013 – April 2015

subsectionBody.text: Collaborated with five student organizations to design custom marketing materials aimed at increasing event attendance and campus awareness.
Designed physical and digital posters for annual events, ensuring high visibility and engagement within the SMU student body.
Created branded t-shirts for the East Asian Student Association and Asian Council using Photoshop and Illustrator, strengthening their campus presence.

Led front-end development for multiple projects, designing and implementing scalable web solutions while collaborating with cross-functional teams. Took ownership of UI/UX development, preparing wireframes, gathering requirements, and delivering intuitive interfaces that improved user experience and stakeholder satisfaction.
Stepped in at critical points to accelerate project timelines, optimizing workflows, streamlining processes, and ensuring high-quality deliverables across multiple workstreams.
Developed and presented UI/UX prototypes and demos to senior stakeholders, influencing design decisions and driving adoption of modern front-end solutions.
Mentored junior team members and offshore developers, providing guidance on best practices and fostering a collaborative development environment.
* Utilized React.js, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS (SCSS), Bootstrap 5, Redux, Adobe Campaign, Adobe Marketo, Git, and Visual Studio Code to develop and optimize web applications.

Transitioned from ad hoc website updates to developing standardized template designs, improving efficiency and consistency across projects.

Integrated a strategic client’s third-party mockup into the company's content management system, ensuring seamless compatibility for a real estate portfolio of over 52,500 units across the US and Canada.
Migrated multiple legacy website designs to modern frameworks, enhancing performance, responsiveness, and maintainability.
Utilized Bootstrap, LESS, jQuery, and HTML5 to build dynamic and visually appealing web experiences.

subsectionData.subsectionSubheading: SMU Meadows School of the Arts | February 2013 – May 2016

subsectionBody.text: Supported faculty by preparing learning materials and assisting with lesson plans.
Provided administrative support for admissions, alumni relations, and academic departments.
Managed interoffice communication and streamlined document organization, improving response efficiency.
Designed and developed responsive websites using WordPress, enhancing brand presence and usability.
Created SEO-optimized content, improving search visibility and engagement.
Analyzed web performance data and provided strategic recommendations to improve site traffic and business operations.
